p: It must be mentioned that in some patients, COVID-19 antibodies are not always found after recovery, which suggests that some patients recover without antibodies [149] or else the antibodies vanish after recovery. Although one study evaluated the effectiveness of plasma therapy in five patients (who were mechanically ventilated and received methylprednisolone) all of them showed a reduction in COVID-19 symptoms and viral load, it is not yet clear that the antibodies from donors are active and effective or not [150].
